    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public PlainChannel.State getState()
        returns the state of the channel. This class that implements the channel interface has a private attribute state. Other classes that implement channel (and the decorator abstract class) need to pass the request thru their channel private attribute.

      • setState

        public void setState(PlainChannel.State state)
        Sets the state of the channel. This class that implements the channel interface has a private attribute state. Other classes that implement channel (and the decorator abstract class) need to pass the request thru their channel private attribute.
